instructions: In Photos on iCloud.com, do one of the following: Tap the Photos tab to see thumbnails of all your photos and videos. Tap the Albums tab, then tap an album or folder to view its contents. To view a photo or video full screen, tap a thumbnail. While viewing a photo full screen, you can swipe to see other photos. You can also tap or swipe the thumbnails at the bottom of the screen to see other photos.
